titleStmt.title: Macbeth a tragædy : with all the alterations, amendments, additions, and new songs : as it's now acted at the Dukes Theatre.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

notesStmt.note: Alteration and additions by Sir William D'Avenant. Cf. Bartlett.
